display_long_description:
Come & wonder around this beautifully landscaped Nexon theme park, interact with total stranger, and make new friends online. Crazy arcade VR offers various mini games you can play with others online, together with social & customization features. 
During the early access; i)Tennis: An arcade style tennis you can go solo or play with others online. ii)Crossbow: A challenging crossbow game to compete with others. iii)Shooting: Unleash your shooting instinct and go crazy to set new record iV)Bowling: Let’s see who’s got the skill. We are looking for serial strikers. v)My room: For you to manage and customize your characters and inventory. 
**Please note that the game is an online game that requires internet connection. And only accessible from a few selected regions with limited amount of game contents for beta testing. We are going to gradually release new game and new contents over the time.**
